question: 大違い
sourceMnemonic: <ja>違い</ja> is <kanji>difference</kanji>, so a <kanji>big</kanji> one of those is a <vocabulary>big difference</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is <ja>違う</ja> plus <ja>大</ja> of <ja>大きい</ja> (<ja>おお</ja>) put together. You can remember this because when you see the difference (the BIG difference), you say "oohhhhh" (<ja>お</ja>), because you were surprised you didn't see it before.
